info.name: Flat Facebook
info.description: Flat Facebook Is a Flat Color for change Entire page on facebook
info.additionalInfo:
Feel free for Editing and Redesign Are Welcome.

But Please Dont Reupload !

instructions For Editing :
Using Inspect Element on the Facebook element , where you want to change the element for example :

you must specific tag name a,p,div,textarea,or button id like "example" and then insert !important value into CSS for making it overiding the default facebook element .

- Initiial Release
